items.name: Healing Potion
items.description: You regain 2d4 + 2 hit points when you drink this potion. Drinking or administering a potion takes an action.

items.name: Longbow
items.description: A tall bow for shooting arrows at long range.

items.name: Shortsword
items.description: A short, lightweight sword ideal for quick strikes.

items.name: Leather Armor
items.description: The breastplate and shoulder protectors of this armor are made of leather that has been stiffened by being boiled in oil.

items.name: Arrows
items.description: Arrows for use with a bow. Comes in a quiver of 20.

items.name: Rope, Hempen (50 feet)
items.description: Rope has 2 hit points and can be burst with a DC 17 Strength check.

items.name: Torch
items.description: A torch burns for 1 hour, providing bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet.

items.name: Rations (1 day)
items.description: Rations consist of dry foods suitable for extended travel, including jerky, dried fruit, hardtack, and nuts.

items.name: Backpack
items.description: A backpack can hold 1 cubic foot or 30 pounds of gear.

items.name: Bedroll
items.description: A bedroll allows you to sleep more comfortably in the wilderness.

items.name: Waterskin
items.description: A waterskin can hold up to 4 pints of liquid.

items.name: Tinderbox
items.description: This small container holds flint, fire steel, and tinder used to kindle a fire. Lighting a torch takes 1 action.

items.name: Explorer's Pack
items.description: Includes a backpack, bedroll, mess kit, tinderbox, 10 torches, 10 days of rations, waterskin, and 50 feet of rope.

items.name: Dagger
items.description: A simple, lightweight blade useful in melee or at range.

items.name: Antitoxin
items.description: A creature that drinks this vial of liquid gains advantage on saving throws against poison for 1 hour.
